edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.bus
Class BatchIngestThreadManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.bus.BatchIngestThreadManager

public class BatchIngestThreadManager
extends java.lang.Object

Contains BatchIngestThreadHolders, giving access to all batch set threads. This object contains a map of BatchIngestThreadHolders with their batch set name as the key . Each BatchIngestThreadHolder contains one batch ingest background thread.
This class assumes that while you can have multiple ingest's running at a time, for one or multiple institutions, only ONE ingest of a particular institutions 'batch set' will be running at a time. For example this object provides status for multiple CODU batch sets that may be running at the same time, however there cannot be two instances of a particular batch set under the CODU institution running at the same time.

Author:
chet.rebman
See Also:
edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.bus, BatchIngestThreadHolder, BatchIngestController
